mapper.insert: insert into Members (account, email, pwd) values (#{account}, #{email}, #{pwd})
mapper.select: SELECT m.MID, m.ACCOUNT, p.NICKNAME, p.IMG_URL, p.STATUS_MESSAGE FROM MEMBERS m LEFT JOIN PROFILES p ON m.MID = p.MID LEFT JOIN FRIENDS f ON ( (f.REQ_ID = #{loginMid} AND f.ACC_ID = m.MID) OR (f.ACC_ID = #{loginMid} AND f.REQ_ID = m.MID) ) WHERE p.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND (f.STATUS IS NULL OR f.STATUS != 'ACCEPTED') ORDER BY p.NICKNAME
